import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; export default function App() { const [textItem, setTextItem] = useState(""); const [savedItem, setSavedItem] = useState([]); function handleText(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTextItem([...savedItem], { title: textItem }); } return ( <>

Basic Pokemon

Trio Pokemon

180 HP

Quick Attack: Flip a coin. if heads this attack does 50 more damage

70+

Ultra Beat Up: if there is a stadium card in play, discard it. if you do, this attack does 100 more damage

70+

weakness

resistance

retreat cost

handleText(e.target.value)} />
); }
